sourcesContent:
import { Modal, Box } from '@mui/material' import { BookModalContent, BookInfoContainer, BookTitleContainer, BookDescriptionContainer, BookDetails } from './BookModal.style'; const style = { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', bgcolor: 'background.paper', border: '1px solid #fff', boxShadow: 24, p: 4, borderRadius: 4, width: '700px', }; export function BookModal({book, onClose, isOpen}){ const publicationDate = new Date(book?.publicationDate)?.toLocaleDateString('he') ?? ''; return(
{book?.title}
{book?.description}
Author: {book?.author}
Genre: {book?.genre}
Publication Date: {publicationDate}
Price: {book?.price}$
) }
